text: ExhaustedI am okay around others  But when i am alone  things quickly decline and my baseline is to think about how i want to end it that will be the nicest to my loved ones  I just lie in bed  don t move  don t clean  don t shower but you would never know when i m out on the weekend  Another weekend has gone by and i just notice how everyone is so concerned about their own happiness that they forget or fail to notice if anyone else is doing okay  Even if they do notice  it s hard because without the conversation you still feel unseen  I know a lot of ways to improve my mood but i really am that lazy and i feel like i am giving up on myself   Any words of advice will help at this moment  thank you for your time
